subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Sammy Sosa hit a grand slam for his 599th career home run last night and took another little hop toward history while leading the Texas Rangers to a 7-6 victory against the Cincinnati Reds.
snippet: Sammy Sosa hit a grand slam for his 599th career home run last night and took another little hop toward history while leading the Texas Rangers to a 7-6 victory against the Cincinnati Reds.
